md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: Teenage friends come of age in a small New England town.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: As Joey (Katie Holmes), Jen (Michelle Williams) and Jack move to Boston for college, Dawson (James Van Der Beek) heads for Los Angeles, only to become disillusioned with filmmaking and land back at home after his father’s death. md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: As Joey (Katie Holmes), Jen (Michelle Williams) and Jack move to Boston for college, Dawson (James Van Der Beek) heads for Los Angeles, only to become disillusioned with filmmaking and land back at home after his father’s death. Following a roller-coaster relationship with Pacey (Joshua Jackson), Joey is struggling with her unresolved feelings for Dawson when she arrives at Worthington, where she falls in love with a professor and is exposed to college’s wilder side by a new roommate. While Jack’s (Kerr Smith) personal traumas soon bring him to the brink of disaster, and Jen’s job at the college radio station introduces her to a musician who may just change her mind about men, Pacey makes his way to Boston too. Meanwhile Dawson heads back to California for another stab at making movies, Jen and Jack plan to spend the summer in Costa Rica, and Joey takes a long-awaited trip to Paris.
